Package ajbc.doodle.calendar.controllers

Class NotificationController

java.lang.Object
ajbc.doodle.calendar.controllers.NotificationController
@RequestMapping("/notifications") @RestController public class NotificationController extends Object
controller that implements the API for Notifications
Author:
Rotem

  • Constructor Details

      public NotificationController()

  • Method Details

    • addNotification

      @RequestMapping(method=POST, path="/{userId}/{eventId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addNotification(@RequestBody ajbc.doodle.calendar.entities.Notification notification, @PathVariable Integer userId, @PathVariable Integer eventId)
      add a new notification to the DB adds the notification to the notification manager
      Parameters:
      notification - the notification
      userId - the id of the notification's user
      eventId - the id of the notification's event (event of the user)
      Returns:
      the notification object with id, error if the process failed

    • addNotifications

      @RequestMapping(method=POST, path="addlist/{userId}/{eventId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addNotifications(@RequestBody List<ajbc.doodle.calendar.entities.Notification> notifications, @PathVariable Integer userId, @PathVariable Integer eventId)
      adds a list of notifications to the db adds the list of the notifications to the notification manager
      Parameters:
      notifications - the notifications
      userId - the notifications user id
      eventId - the notifications event id (event of the user)
      Returns:
      the list of the notifications with id, error if the process failed

    • getNotificationById

      @RequestMapping(method=GET, path="/{notificationId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getNotificationById(@PathVariable Integer notificationId)
      get notification by id
      Parameters:
      notificationId - the id of the notification
      Returns:
      the notification object, error if the process failed

    • getNotifications

      @RequestMapping(method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getNotifications(@RequestParam Map<String,String> map)
      get notifications by the request params eventId: get all notifications of event with id eventId email: get all notifications of user with email no param: get all notifications in db
      Parameters:
      map - the map of the requst params
      Returns:
      the list of the required notifications, error if the process failed

    • updateNotification

      @RequestMapping(method=PUT, path="/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateNotification(@RequestBody ajbc.doodle.calendar.entities.Notification notification, @PathVariable Integer userId)
      update notification adds the updated notification to the notification manager
      Parameters:
      notification - the notification
      userId - the id of the notification's user (only the user is allowed to update their notification)
      Returns:
      the updated notification, error if the update failed

    • updateNotifications

      @RequestMapping(method=PUT) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateNotifications(@RequestBody List<ajbc.doodle.calendar.entities.Notification> notifications)
      update list of notifications adds the updated notifications to the notification manager
      Parameters:
      notifications - the list of notifications
      Returns:
      the updated list, error if the update failed

    • deactivateNotification

      @RequestMapping(method=PUT, path="/{notificationId}/deactivate") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deactivateNotification(@PathVariable Integer notificationId)
      deactivates notification deletes notification in notification manager
      Parameters:
      notificationId - the id of the notification
      Returns:
      the notification object, error if the process failed

    • deactivateNotifications

      @RequestMapping(method=PUT, path="/deactivate") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deactivateNotifications(@RequestBody List<Integer> notificationIds)
      deactivates list of notifications deletes the notifications from notification manager
      Parameters:
      notificationIds - the ids of the notifications
      Returns:
      success message, error if failed

    • deleteNotification

      @RequestMapping(method=DELETE, path="/{notificationId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteNotification(@PathVariable Integer notificationId)
      deletes notification from db deletes the notification from the notification manager
      Parameters:
      notificationId - the notification id
      Returns:
      success message, error if failed

    • deleteNotifications

      @RequestMapping(method=DELETE) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteNotifications(@RequestBody List<Integer> notificationIds)
      delete list of notification delete the notifications from notification manager
      Parameters:
      notificationIds - the ids of the notifications
      Returns:
      success message, error if failed

    • publicSigningKey

      @GetMapping(path="/publicSigningKey", produces="application/octet-stream") public byte[] publicSigningKey()

    • publicSigningKeyBase64

      @GetMapping(path="/publicSigningKeyBase64") public String publicSigningKeyBase64()
